subject: ADS Private Finance Group LTD
body:
ADS Private Finance Group LTD.
Level 30, The Leadenhall Building, 122 Leadenhall Street,
London, EC3V 4AB.
Dear, 
I am Maxwell Jones Jr., Manager with ADS Private Finance Group. We are offering corporate and personal loans at 3% interest rate for the duration of 15 years. We provide a broad range of services to both commercial and private clients. As a major UK loan firm, we serve local, regional, national and international customers. We also pay 1.2% commission to brokers who introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities.
I will await your kind response, if you are interested we will explain in more details. Please email me back on this email: ID: 
infoinfo_2341@yahoo.co.jp
Yours faithfully
Mr. Maxwell Jones Jr.
Manager Finance & Account
ADS Private Finance Group

subject: Re:  ADS Private Finance Group LTD
body:
Dear Mr. Maxwell Jones Jr.,

Thank you for your offer. I am interested in learning more about the services provided by ADS Private Finance Group. Could you please provide me with more details regarding the terms and conditions of your loans, as well as any other relevant information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ralph
